A green, tarragon-flavoured fizzy drink called Tarkhun is among the Russian food and drink brands being pushed by the Kremlin as an alternative to rapidly disappearing Western favourites. 
Coca-Cola… [+7134 chars]

articles.author: Louis Casiano
articles.title: Amazon misled, obstructed Congress in competition inquiry, House panel says in letter to DOJ seeking probe - Fox Business
articles.description: A bipartisan group of congressional lawmakers is asking the Justice Department to launch a probe into Amazon and its top executives over whether they lied to or misled Congress over the company's business practices in an effort to surpass their competitors.
